Package DAO

Class EventDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.EventDAO
public class EventDAO extends Object
This class interfaces with the database, it can query, update, remove, or drop

      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • findEvent

      public Event findEvent(String eventID, String authtoken) throws DataAccessError
      Will (query) find an event based on event ID in event table
      Parameters:
      eventID - The event ID correlates to primary key in database table
      authtoken - auth token needed to retrieve an event
      Returns:
      event object with current eventID.
      Throws:
      DataAccessError - exception

    • findAll

      public Event[] findAll(String username, String authtoken) throws DataAccessError
      finds the events of all family members of the user
      Parameters:
      username - we will use the username to find all family members
      authtoken - auth token needed to retrieve an event
      Returns:
      a primitive array of all events
      Throws:
      DataAccessError - exception

      public void clear() throws DataAccessError
      We are deleting(clearing) all rows

    • removeEvent

      public void removeEvent(String eventID) throws DataAccessError
      We are removing specified event using the eventID
      Parameters:
      eventID - The row that the user wishes to remove using some sort of identifier
      Throws:
      DataAccessError - exception

    • update

      public void update(Event event) throws DataAccessError
      We will update a table, by editing values within the rows
      Parameters:
      event - we will pass through an object that is a model of the database and update the results so we know the current data in memory
      Throws:
      DataAccessError - exception

    • findForUser

      public Event[] findForUser(String username) throws DataAccessError
      This class will return a list of all events for this user
      Parameters:
      username - This will be the users username
      Returns:
      This will return a primitive array of events from the events table
      Throws:
      DataAccessError - exception

    • insertEvents

      public void insertEvents(Event[] listOfEvents) throws DataAccessError
      This will receive a list of events, this is used in conjunction with the load function
      Parameters:
      listOfEvents - array of event objects
      Throws:
      DataAccessError
